actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 1991, the duty on transparent acrylic decorative articles containing a cavity formed in one wall.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1991, the duty on transparent acrylic decorative articles containing a cavity formed in one wall.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 1991, the duty on transparent acrylic decorative articles containing a cavity formed in one wall.
